actions.committee: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure. Oversight, Ways and Means, and Commerce, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Surface Transportation.

official_title: To amend title 23, United States Code, relating to the sale of alcoholic beverages to persons who are less than 21 years of age.

summary.text: Jeramy's Act - Directs the Secretary of Transportation to withhold specified percentages of Federal-aid highway funds apportioned to States that permit the sale of alcoholic beverages to persons who are less than 21 years old. (Current law applies similar withholding sanctions to States that permit the purchase or public possession of such beverages by persons under 21.)

titles.title: To amend title 23, United States Code, relating to the sale of alcoholic beverages to persons who are less than 21 years of age.
